main event: A witness observed three yellow objects flying in the sky over Hickory, North Carolina and disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The objects were observed for about 30 minutes, initially hovering or standing still, then moving up and down and side to side.
The objects were described as bright, unsteady, and covering about half the size of a match held at arm's length.
The witness had a child with them who also observed the objects.
The objects eventually faded and disappeared behind some trees.
The witness had previously seen similar phenomena but did not provide details on those prior sightings.
sighted object: three yellow objects in the sky
